default.comment: Use for critical text, such as fields error messaging.

bold.comment: Use for critical text, such as fields error messaging.

default.comment: Use for text to emphasize caution.

bold.comment: Use for text to emphasize caution.

default.comment: Use for text to communicate successful results.

bold.comment: Use for text to communicate successful results.

default.comment: Use for informative text to communicate something is in progress.

bold.comment: Use for informative text to communicate something is in progress.

default.comment: Use for text that reinforces our brand.

bolder.comment: Use for text that reinforces our brand.

default.comment: Use for primary text, such as body copy, sentence case headers;  Use as hover text color for $text-light

bold.comment: Use for secondary text, such as navigation, light button links, Inputs labels color; Use as hover text color for $text-lighter

light.comment: Use for tertiary text, such as helper text and meta-data; Use as hover text color for $text-lightest

inverse.comment: Use for text on interactive and bold backgrounds.

inverse-lighter.comment: Use for text on interactive and bold backgrounds.

inverse-lightest.comment: Use for text on interactive and bold backgrounds.

lighter.comment: Use for tertiary text, such as helper text and meta-data;

selected.comment: Use for text in selected or opened states.

inverse-light.comment: Use for text on interactive and bold backgrounds.

lightest.comment: Use for tertiary text, such as helper text and meta-data;

default.comment: Use for links in default or hovered state. Add underline for hovered states.

pressed.comment: Use for links in a pressed state

visited.comment: Use for links in a visited state
